General.Name: 333D Ltd
General.Description: 333D Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides 3D printing services in Australia. The company offers 3D printing equipment and consumables; and sells 3D prints. 333D Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Laverton North, Australia.
General.Address: 34 Jimmy Place, Laverton North, VIC, Australia, 3026
